div.div:
✓ HTTPS 強制 (CloudFront)
✓ CSRF 保護 (NextAuth.js)
✓ JWT 署名検証 (HS256)
✓ HTTP-only Cookie
✓ レート制限 (AWS WAF)
✓ DynamoDB 暗号化 (AWS Managed)
✓ CloudWatch 暗号化 (KMS)
✓ 最小権限 IAM ロール

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 242, 204), rgb(40, 29, 0)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(214, 182, 86), rgb(109, 81, 0));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 318px; height: 1px; padding-top: 627px; margin-left: 351px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

display: inline-block; font-size: 13px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 278px; height: 1px; padding-top: 657px; margin-left: 372px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
1. ユーザー → CloudFront → Lambda
2. NextAuth.js が OAuth フロー実行
3. Google からユーザー情報取得
4. DynamoDB へユーザー登録/更新
5. JWT 生成 → HTTP-only Cookie セット
6. ユーザーへレスポンス返却

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
